verbose_text: In LvIAP1- or LvIAP3 silenced shrimp, the expression of WSSV VP28 increased dramatically compared with that in the dsGFP control group (XREF_FIG), suggesting protective roles of LvIAP1 and LvIAP3 in shrimp defense against WSSV infection.
evidence: WSSV VP28 increased dramatically compared with that in the dsGFP control group ( XREF_FIG ), suggesting protective roles of LvIAP1 and LvIAP3
